short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RUSSH Extentsion shows offers on your cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RUSSH lets you discover online offers on your credit and debit cards as well as UPI payments at your fingertips. Online offers on E-commerce, Groceries, Dining, Lifestyle, Electronics, etc which were always there but you never knew. You will be surprised by the number of offers you were missing!
